_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Server Information:
[img]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/MODICONS3.png[/img] Development Team [img]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/MODICONS3.png[/img]
- Mohd - Java Programmer - None - Java Programmer - Brandon - Website Developer _______________________ _______________________
[img]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/MODICONS3.png[/img]At SpecRamPaGE [img]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/MODICONS3.png[/img] We are not concerned with making money. That is not our aim nor will it ever be. Our aim is to provide you an optimal experience followed by stellar game play to leave you thirsting for more. Your enjoyment of our game is what we strive for. & before release to public, we will making sure our server is completely to perfection
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
- Introduction and introducing myself, other information. -
I'm Mohd - Founder/Lead Developer(could be changed)/Owner - I'm going to describe myself as Anti-guy attitude,Hiring legit staff know what they are doing,communicating with players & staff,helping improving The social skills around,do what is right to do,and do the best ever.
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[u]THIS THREAD WILL BE UPDATED LATER FOR MEDIA & loads of information [/u]
